name: Aetheria Online
description: Aetheria is a 2D Action Combat MMORPG which focuses on challenging dungeons, cooperative group play, fast paced PvP, and important crafting elements.
minimum_requirements: OS: 32-bit Windows Processor: Intel Celeron G3950 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows Processor: Intel Core i3-3210 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
